summary: HeroSection background image URL was updated to the requested cinematic texture and an overlay gradient is present. However, the required new PNG asset itself is not shown as added in the diff summary, and there are additional unrequested metadata/documentation file modifications.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add the new cinematic grunge background PNG at frontend/public/assets/generated/axses-hero-cinematic-texture.dim_1920x1080.png (atmospheric, no text/logos/faces/identifiable characters; controlled exposure/contrast).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and there is no evidence that the required PNG asset was created under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for updating the hero background and adding a static image asset; it did not request changes to project metadata files.
BuildRequest did not request documentation/index updates; only hero background styling/image update was in scope.
